postContent:
Grateful to have shared our vision for the future of CRMs at Razorpay Rize Demo Day! 

Building Angoor AI alongside Rishabh Kumar and Anuj Agrawal has been an incredible journey. We're reimagining what customer relationship management can look like when AI and humans work in seamless collaboration.

The traditional CRM is broken - it's fragmented, with touchpoints that are disconnected, and manual processes that slow everything down. At Angoor, we're creating an AI-native platform that unifies the entire B2C customer journey with intelligent context and automation.

Thank you to the Razorpay team and everyone who joined Demo Day. The response has been overwhelming, and we're just getting started!
Excited to transform how businesses grow and create those unforgettable customer experiences. ðŸš€

#AngoorAI #CRM #AIFirst #RazorpayRize #StartupJourney #CustomerExperience
author: Arpit Agrawal
